explanation: There are several opinions suggesting caution, with many referencing failed trendline retests, double tops on higher timeframes, and a possible bull trap. Multiple users mention the risk of longing and the need for a retracement before considering a long position. While some still see an overall uptrend, the immediate sentiment for the 1-minute candlestick is bearish.
representative_opinions: Tjeerd Phaff: my simple ta saying we broke trend line tested it and rejected
oscartg638: it was rejected at the 1min for sure
TraderX: people need to remember we've come up a lot in past few days. Nothing goes up forever.
Tjeerd Phaff: I would not long until we get a decent retracement
Amo Menottant: will retrace after locally bouncing on LSOBs
Mar: They want to trap lot of shorts
Olu Folarin: Yup, it still looks like an uptrend to me
Asi Landes: we are on the up trend line
Architec(MattyB!!!): all signs say its a dump cake
